name: @jodzjcm/string-format
description: A string formatter inspired by Angular's text interpolation.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && npx prettier --write src/ && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.npm:publish:test: npm run build && cp ./package.json ./dist/package.json && cp ./README.md ./dist/README.md && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.npm:publish: npm run build && cp ./package.json ./dist/package.json && cp ./README.md ./dist/README.md && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE && cd dist && npm publish --access=public

author: jodzjcm
